wikipedia_page.main: Michael Wainwright (born 6 March 1973 in Warrington, England) is a singer-songwriter from Canada. He has released two albums, The Circus Is Coming To Town and Wainwright. He is the background vocalist and opening act for Tears For Fears.

response: Michael Wainwright (born 4 November 1980) is an English former rugby league footballer who last played for the Dewsbury Rams.
